New Records: Sese Bau became the second Papua New Guinea batter to hit a fifty in the T20 World Cup after Assad Vala in 2021.
Key Match Events: West Indies won the toss and chose to bowl first.
Papua New Guinea's innings started shaky, reaching 50 for four.
Sese Bau played a crucial innings of 50 runs off 43 balls, forming a 44-run partnership with Charles Amini.
Bau's dismissal marked a slowdown in Papua New Guinea's scoring.
